```{=html}
<div class="list quarto-listing-custom">

    <div class="posts-detail-list-img-content">
        <ul class="posts-detail-list-img">

        <%/* create custom listing */%>
<% for (const item of items) { %>
  <div class="quarto-post posts-detail-list-img-post" onclick="window.location.href='<%= item["outputHref"] %>'" <%= metadataAttrs(item) %> >
      <li class="posts-detail-list-img-entity posts-detail-list-img-date" data-content-date="<%= item['date'] %>">
        <div class="posts-detail-list-img-thumb"><img src="<%= item['image'] %>"></div>
        <div class="posts-detail-list-img-description">
            <h5 class="posts-detail-list-img-title"><%= item['threeword'] %></h5>
            <h6><%= item['title'] %></h6>
            <p><%= item['description'] %><% if (item.categories) {%>
                <div class="listing-categories">
                  <% for (const category of item.categories) { %>
                  <div class="listing-category" onclick="window.quartoListingCategory('/papers/<%=category%>'); return false;"><%= category %></div>
                  <% } %>
                  </div>
                  <% } %>
                  <% if (item.tweethread){%><a href="<%= item['tweetthread'] %>">Twitter Thread</a> <%}%>
                  <% if (item.relatedpost){%><a href="<%= item['relatedpost'] %>">Post</a> <%}%>
                  <% if (item.relatedpaper){%><a href="<%= item['relatedpaper'] %>">Paper</a> <%}%>
                  <% if (item.press){%><a href="<%= item['publicity'] %>">Publicity</a> <%}%>
                  <% if (item.demo){%><a href="<%= item['demo'] %>">Demo</a> <%}%>
                  <% if (item.repo){%><a href="<%= item['repo'] %>">Repo</a> <%}%>
                </p>
        </div>
    </li>

</div>

<% } %>

	</ul>
</div>
</div>
```

//POSTS
$deg: -86deg;
$trans: all 0.4s ease 0s;

.posts-detail-list-img {
  padding: 0em;
  margin: 0;
}

.posts-detail-list-img .quarto-post {
  margin: 0em;
  cursor: pointer;
}

.posts-detail-list-img-entity {
  margin: 1.5em 0 0.5em;
  padding: 0.73em;
  box-shadow: 5px 5px 1px $verylightpink;
  position: relative;
  list-style: none;
  display: inline-block;
  transform: scale(0.85);
  transition: $trans;
}

.posts-detail-list-img-post:nth-of-type(even) .posts-detail-list-img-entity {
  text-align: right;
  box-shadow: -5px 5px 1px $verylightpink;
}

.posts-detail-list-img-post:nth-of-type(even)>li>div.posts-detail-list-img-description>.listing-categories {
  justify-content: right;
}

.posts-detail-list-img-post:nth-of-type(even) .posts-detail-list-img-entity:hover {
  text-align: right;
  box-shadow: -5px 5px 1px $lightpink;
}

.posts-detail-list-img-thumb {
  width: 13vmin;
  height: 13vmin;
  float: left;
  margin-right: 1.25em;
  background: linear-gradient($deg,
      $lightpurple 0 70%,
      $lightpink 0% 100%);
  transform: rotate(-4deg);
  transition: $trans;
  border-radius: 0.25em;
  overflow: hidden;
  margin-left: -3em;
  padding: 0.5em;
}

.posts-detail-list-img-post:nth-of-type(even) .posts-detail-list-img-entity .posts-detail-list-img-thumb {
  --deg: 86deg;
  float: right;
  margin-left: 2em;
  margin-right: -3em;
  transform: rotate(4deg);
}

.posts-detail-list-img-thumb img {
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  border-radius: 0.25em;
  filter: grayscale(1);
  background: $purple;
}

.posts-detail-list-img-entity:hover {
  transform: scale(0.9);
  transition: $trans;
  box-shadow: 5px 5px 2px $lightpink;
}

.posts-detail-list-img-entity:hover .posts-detail-list-img-thumb,
.posts-detail-list-img-post:nth-of-type(even):hover .posts-detail-list-img-entity .posts-detail-list-img-thumb {
  padding: 0.1em;
  transition: $trans;
  transform: rotate(-1deg);
  --deg: -89deg;
}

.posts-detail-list-img-entity:hover .posts-detail-list-img-thumb img {
  filter: none;
  transition: $trans;
}

.posts-detail-list-img-description p {
  padding: 0 2em;
  margin-bottom: 1em;
}

.posts-detail-list-img-title {
  background: $purple;
  display: inline;
  transform: rotate(-2deg);
  position: absolute;
  margin: 10px;
  margin-top: -2.25em;
  left: 9vmin;
  padding: 0.25em 0.5em;
  color: $verylightpink;
  border-radius: 0.25em;
  font-size: 1.35em;
  transform-origin: left bottom;
}

.posts-detail-list-img-post:nth-of-type(even) .posts-detail-list-img-entity h5 {
  left: inherit;
  right: 9vmin;
  transform: rotate(2deg);
  transform-origin: right bottom;
}

.posts-detail-list-img-entity:hover h5,
.posts-detail-list-img-post:nth-of-type(even) .posts-detail-list-img-entity:hover h5 {
  transition: $trans;
  transform: rotate(0deg);
  background: rgba($pink, 0.7)
}

.posts-detail-list-img-date:after {
  content: attr(data-content-date);
  font-family: monospace;
  font-size: 0.75em;
  position: absolute;
  top: -1.5em;
  background: $lightpink;
  right: 4em;
  transform: rotate(3deg);
  padding: 0.35em 0.75em 0.5em;
  border-radius: 0.25em;
  color: $purple;
  font-weight: bold;
}

.posts-detail-list-img-post:nth-of-type(even) .posts-detail-list-img-date:after {
  right: inherit;
  left: 4em;
  transform: rotate(-3deg);
}

.posts-detail-list-img-description a {
  font-size: small;
  display: inline-block !important;
  margin: 0.5em 0 0 0 !important;
  background: $indigo !important;
  color: $white !important;
  padding: 0.1em 0.5em 0.35em !important;
  border-radius: 0.5em !important;
  text-decoration: none !important;
  transition: $trans !important;
}

.posts-detail-list-img-description a img {
  float: left;
  width: 22px;
  filter: invert(1);
  border-radius: 0.15em;
  padding: 2px;
  background: #fff;
  margin-right: 2px;
}

.posts-detail-list-img .quarto-post {
  border: none;
}

@media (max-width: 767px) {
  .posts-detail-list-img-date:after {
    right: 0.2em;
  }

  .posts-detail-list-img-post:nth-of-type(even) .posts-detail-list-img-date:after {
    left: 0.2em;
  }

  .posts-detail-list-img .quarto-post {
    padding-bottom: 0em;
  }
}
